text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GE75 8SF-097CA Raider 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the MSI GE75 8SF-097CA Raider 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the MSI GE75 8SF-097CA Raider 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
